# Faction: Neutral Total: 60

Play for yourself, and eliminate everyone around you. Neutrals can win alone, but they can also win with other players. Their victory conditions are different from other players. Each Neutral player has a unique victory condition.

Note

As of Version 3.1.0 Dev 2, Coven Faction has been removed and all its roles have been moved to the Neutral Faction.

Role Count
Benign13
Chaos11
Evil7
Killing29

# Benign

Amnesiac | Follower | Hater | Imitator | Lawyer | Maverick | Opportunist | Pursuer | Romantic | Shaman | Witch

# Chaos

Collector | Cultist | Phantom | Pirate | Provocateur | Revolutionist | Soul Collector | Terrorist | Vector | Vulture | Workaholic

# Evil

Cursed Soul | Doomsayer | Executioner | Innocent | Jester | Masochist | Seeker

# Killing

Agitator | Arsonist | Bandit | Blood Knight | Demon | Glitch | Hex Master | Huntsman | Infectious | Jackal | Jinx | Juggernaut | Medusa | Necromancer | Occultist | Pelican | Pickpocket | Plaguebearer | Poisoner | Potion Master | Pyromaniac | Serial Killer | Shroud | Stalker | Traitor | Virus | Werewolf | Wraith

Neutral Settings
Below are settings to make the game more balanced based on your lobby's style of gameplay:
  • Minimum Amount of Non-Neutral Killing roles
    • Set the minimal amount of Non-Neutral Killing roles allowed in the round
  • Maximum Amount of Non-Neutral Killing roles
    • Set the max amount of Non-Neutral Killing roles allowed in the round
  • Minimum Amount of Neutral Killing roles
    • Set the minimal amount of Neutral Killing roles allowed in the round
  • Maximum Amount of Neutral Killing roles
    • Set the max amount of Non-Neutral Killing roles allowed in the round
  • Neutrals win together
    • ON: Certain Neutral Types will win together
      • If a Killing-Neutral wins, all Killing-Neutrals win. If an Evil-Neutral wins, all Evil-Neutrals win
    • OFF: Neutrals will win on their own team (Ex: Arsonist wins alone)
      • All Neutrals win together
        • ON: ALL Neutrals win together, even if they are Evil, Killing, or Chaos Neutrals
        • OFF: Only each Neutral Type will win together
